about_the_game:
Stranger Danger! Stranger Danger is a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual!

The Stranger arrives on Sker Island under mysterious circumstances, his origins and intentions are unknown!



The Stranger Danger DLC unlocks a new mask and exclusive items so you can mystify and confuse those who stand against you.

Plague Sker Island and all its residents with the seemingly hypnotising Stranger mask. Delve into the underbelly of Sker Island sewers as your background. Bewilder your friends with The Stranger’s exclusive in-game Strange Whispers and display your enigmatic presence with the Stranger Player Emblem.



This pack includes 4 new items:

The Stranger’s Mask


An Exclusive Premium Mask of the mysterious and dangerous Stranger

Sker Island Sewers


An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Sker Island Sewers

Stranger’s Whispers


An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line to taunt your foes and friends

Stranger’s Emblem


An Exclusive Stranger’s Emblem Player Icon to confuse those that challenge you

name: Sker Ritual - Stranger Danger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Plague Sker Island and hypnotise all its residents with The Stranger, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
